meanings.sent1: I will reweighing the apples to make sure they are all the same weight.
meanings.sent2: The chef is reweighing the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: After reweighing the suitcase, it turned out to be heavier than expected!
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was reweighing her options before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The scientist meticulously reweighing the samples to ensure accuracy.

meanings.definition: The act of weighing something again.
meanings.sent1: The reweighing of the package revealed a discrepancy in the weight.
meanings.sent2: We had to do a reweighing of the shipment to confirm the total weight.
meanings.sent3: The reweighing process seemed never-ending, but it was necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent4: The reweighing of the luggage at the airport caused a delay in the departure.
meanings.sent5: The reweighing of the produce at the market ensured fair pricing for customers.
